game.name: Train Simulator: SR V Schools Class
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Designed by Richard Maunsell and built in the 1930’s, the iconic SR V ‘Schools’ Class steam locomotive is now available for Train Simulator Classic. Authentically recreated here in exquisite detail by developer Bossman Games.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Designed by Richard Maunsell and built in the 1930’s, the iconic SR V ‘Schools’ Class steam locomotive is now available for Train Simulator Classic. Authentically recreated here in exquisite detail by developer Bossman Games.
